response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unser persönliches daten schinden? 🤔 ich dachte, die datenschutz-grundverordnung (dsgvo) wäre klar genug? 🙄 was ist mit unseren rechten los? 🤷‍♂️ #datenschutz #privatsphäre #respekt"

translation:

"why are there still companies that mess with our personal data? 🤔 i thought the general data protection regulation (gdpr) was clear enough? 🙄 what's wrong with our rights? 🤷‍♂️ #dataprivacy #privatesphere #respect"

note: the hashtags used are in english, as they are commonly used on twitter and are easily recognizable by an international audience.
